columns.name: member_account_id
columns.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the member account.

columns.name: administrator_id
columns.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the Security Hub administrator account associated with this member account.

columns.name: email
columns.description: The email address of the member account.

columns.name: invited_at
columns.description: A timestamp for the date and time when the invitation was sent to the member account.

columns.name: master_id
columns.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the Security Hub administrator account associated with this member account.

columns.name: member_status
columns.description: The status of the relationship between the member account and its administrator account.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: The timestamp for the date and time when the member account was updated.
